name: validateVariablesTask
description: Validate Variables by name and/or value.  A quick way to ensure variable values have been resolved if they reference other variables
helpMarkDown: Errors or Warns if any variables match the supplied filters. By default any variables which have a value such as `Number$(NumberVariable)` will be considered invalid
author: Ben Howard

inputs.name: varNameRegex
inputs.label: Variable Name Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: The regular expression to use for filtering variable names. Default is `.*` (all variables)

inputs.name: varValueRegex
inputs.label: Variable Value Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: The regular expression to use for filtering variable values. Default is `\$\(.*?\)` (strings such as `$(this)`)

inputs.name: warnOrError
inputs.label: Warn Or Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Warn Or Error if variables matched
